title: Pages Router vs App Router
subject: Next.js
theory: Pages Router (`pages/`) is the legacy/stable router using standard React components. App Router (`app/`) is the new paradigm using React Server Components, Layouts, and Streaming.

examples.explanation: App Router requires a `page.js` file inside a folder named after the route.

common_mistakes.correction: Stick to App Router for new projects.

interview_questions.question: Diff between Pages and App Router?
interview_questions.answer: App Router supports Server Components and Layouts natively. Pages Router does not.

summary: App Router unlocks the full power of React 18+.
